title: Cauliflower cheese pasta bake
ingredients: ['500g cauliflower florets', '50g butter', 'extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '400g guanciale, cut into pieces (see footnote)', '500g farfalle pasta', '4 processed cheese slices', '100g Provolone or Galbanino cheese, cut into little cubes', '100g grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste']
